document_info.title: Oilahuasca Core Principles and Advanced Concepts
document_info.compiled_from: Forum posts by OnlineAngelicalist/Angelicalist (Rev. Ryan Van Kush)

the_fundamental_insight.key_statement: Theoretically You could drink Gallons of Elemi Oil, full of Elemicin, and have no Psychoactive Effect. Same with Myristicin, You Theoretically could get it PURE, and Drink it in Gallons, and have no Effect.
the_fundamental_insight.the_revelation: But somehow, Nutmeg contains both, and because it contains both, they Activate each other.
the_fundamental_insight.this_activation: That Activation is the basis of all Oilahuasca Science
the_fundamental_insight.the_question: People asked 'Why?', as in 'Why is there no Effect from either one, but there is when they are mixed?', that is why Nutmeg comes up
the_fundamental_insight.clarification: Not because we want People to go get High off of Spoonfulls of Nutmeg, but because the Mechanisms of the Nutmeg 'High' are the basis for all of this Science

betel_leaf_phytochemicals.note: Betel nut active compound is arecoline (different from the leaf compounds)

psilocin_potentiation.discovery: Key CYP enzymes involved in psilocin metabolism
psilocin_potentiation.implication: Oilahuasca herbs that inhibit CYP2D6 and CYP3A4 could POTENTIATE PSILOCYBIN MUSHROOMS
psilocin_potentiation.potential: The 'Perfect context to Discuss Oilahuasca and CYP450 Enzymes'

inhibition.dose_dependent: Higher concentrations result in greater inhibition

induction.context: Studies in rats - dietary eugenol induces CYP1A1 expression in liver

clinical_relevance.drug_interactions: Can affect plasma levels and pharmacological effects of drugs metabolized by these enzymes
clinical_relevance.cyp2d6_cyp3a4_substrates: Eugenol could reduce metabolism, leading to increased drug levels
clinical_relevance.cyp1a1_substrates: Eugenol could increase metabolism of CYP1A1 substrates

the_sequence_principle.statement: It matters WHAT ORDER YOU TAKE THINGS IN, it matters WHAT SEQUENCE YOU INGEST THINGS IN
the_sequence_principle.effects: Can have Profound, Entheogenic, Psychedelic, Medical, and even Deadly Effect
the_sequence_principle.historical_claim: I believe, I can nearly even Prove, Ancient People understood this

examples.maois_and_dmt: How MAOIs Work to allow DMT to be active
examples.myrcene_and_thc: How Myrcene Helps THC cross the Blood Brain Barrier
examples.cinnamon_vanilla_alcohol: How Cinnamon or Vanilla Inhibit Glutathione which causes a Person to get drunker for a longer Period of Time

shulgin_pseunut_cocktail.experiment: Shulgin's attempt to challenge the 'oil-to-amphetamine' concept

recipe.composition: 1 part MDA, 2 parts TMA, 5 parts MMDA
recipe.name: Pseunut Cocktail (pseudo-nutmeg)
recipe.rationale: Should be equivalent to the safrole, elemicin and myristicin in 5 grams of nutmeg

results.effects: Produced quite a sparkle and considerable eye-dilation
results.note: Shulgin never took 5 grams of nutmeg for comparison

key_quotes.brain_movies: The phrase that had been used by several of the subjects was 'brain movies.' Apparently the richest of the effects were to be had with the eyes closed.
key_quotes.rabbit_liver_proof: It has been reported that the passage of this oil [myristicin] through the liver of a rabbit will generate MMDA in that animal.
key_quotes.structural_relationship: The only difference between the two molecules, structurally, are the elements of ammonia. Myristicin plus ammonia gives MMDA.
key_quotes.parsley_rumor: A rumor that had currency in the 1960's, that parsley could get you high, probably had its origins in the reports of myristicin being present, coupled with myristicin being the principal source of MMDA.
key_quotes.essential_amphetamine: The relationship to myristicin (an essential oil) led to the classifying of MMDA as a Essential Amphetamine.

discovery_context.parallel_discovery: Dr. Gordon A. Alles also synthesized and named it MMDA in 1962
discovery_context.alles_death: Alles died in 1963 at age 62, before they could share ideas

defending_the_science.criticism: 69ron is part of an online puppet swarm that generated dangerous pseudoscience

response.shulgin_connection: The Studies Sasha Shulgin did elaborate on the Subject
response.solid_science: The Oilahuasca Science is Solid - has a lot of Legitimate stuff going on
response.expanded_theory: My Point in expanding on the Theory is to Create a kind of Pharmahuasca that expands beyond Oilahuasca and Ayahuasca
response.legitimate_science: What I am Talking about is the Legitimate Science behind CYP Enzymes
response.regardless: Regardless of other Things 69Ron might have been Wrong about, he absolutely was onto something. It's not just some Snake Oil Salesman pitch, it's Really got Science behind it.

future_applications.research_direction: Expanding on what was Real in what 69Ron was Studying, using modern CYP450 science

essential_oil_safety_dosing.critical_statement: You are only supposed to take a few Drops
essential_oil_safety_dosing.context: As like adding Flavor to Coffee
essential_oil_safety_dosing.warning: Don't consume essential oils orally in large quantities as it poses significant risks including death
safety_notes: Clove Oil alone is used to Numb Teeth - has legitimate medicinal use
Nutmeg is not Dangerous unless taken in large quantities
Essential oils are CONCENTRATED - few drops = significant amount of active compounds
analogies: Like Ayahuasca in terms of using MAOIs to make DMT active Orally
Like taking MAGLs before smoking Marijuana
Like Terpenes (such as Myrcene) before smoking Marijuana
Like Depleting Glutathione before drinking Alcohol

old_theory.claim: Allylbenzenes would be turned into Amphetamines when passed through the Human Liver

new_theory.finding: 3 non-Amphetamine Alkaloid Families are Created from Allylbenzenes

the_three_families.family_1: Dimethylamine conjugates (most polar, fastest clearance, shortest duration)
the_three_families.family_3: Pyrrolidine conjugates (least polar/most lipophilic, best BBB penetration, longest duration)
